search_results.title: Brad Pitt foundation sues manufacturer over allegedly defective wood

question: (Jimmy of the Clue Crew reports from New Orleans, LA.)  A wood product called TimberSIL gives Make It Right homes durability; it endures, resists warping, & is a Class A fire retardant, due to being infused with this common transparent material
